Name: Full Monte
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first eight ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Champagne replaces cola and maraschino liqueur replaces triple sec in this sophisticated adaptation of a Long Island Iced Tea.
History: Created by Audrey Saunders at Pegu Club, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Full Monte contains 194 calories
